meanings.sent2: They were sambaing gracefully at the carnival.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried sambaing but slipped on the ice.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was sambaing with joy as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers seemed to be sambaing in the wind.

meanings.definition: The act of dancing the samba.
meanings.sent1: The energetic sambaing brought life to the stage.
meanings.sent2: I watched their sambaing with admiration.
meanings.sent3: The sambaing competition was full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: The city pulsated with the rhythm of sambaing.
meanings.sent5: The joy of sambaing filled the room with happiness.
